description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 7 (Operation Management Plan) of planning permission reference 77933/APP/2023/1940, dated 09/10/2024, for the 'Internal alterations to amalgamate No. 95 (Use Class E), No. 97 (Sui Generis) and No. 99 (Use Class E) into one multi-cuisine unit comprising restaurant/take-away/food delivery involving a change of use to Sui Generis together with minor alterations to the rear elevations of Nos. 95 and 97, erection of a new roof to the store at the rear of No. 99, replacement of existing dilapidated extension between the rear of Nos. 97 and 99, and installation of extraction ducting and flues with associated plant equipment on rooftop areas at the rear of the property (part retrospective).'
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
